description: Lewis Lovhaug provides a retrospective of every Power Rangers season.
name: The History of Power Rangers

original_info.id: The Best of Power Rangers: The Ultimate Rangers_2002
original_info.name: The Best of Power Rangers: The Ultimate Rangers

review.name: Informational
review.reviewBody:
This series features Lewis Lovhaug reviewing the various "Power Rangers" seasons. I admit to not ever being a fan of PR. Well, maybe when I was really young, but certainly not anymore. This series features footage from the episodes with him narrating giving the plot and his opinion. I admit to watching these episodes out of order. I just see them when they appear on his YouTube channel.

I admit that it is more entertaining to hear about the seasons he hates. Then again, it's nice to hear about his favorite ones. I guess it's best when it's just extreme love or extreme hate. HOPR's a pretty weird acronym. If I ever too become a fan, I'll know where to start. I think the logo takes up a lot of space in these videos because he's afraid of violating fair use. ***1/2
